subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] EVP Maker (allaphone file) Method Test
author: bruce halliday
full_text:
--_c6923884-6309-43a7-92a1-71e8316318f4_
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="iso-8859-1"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable


Ron,
 
There is no folder for you in the files section.
Maybe it got lost =
in the shuffle. Re post it so I can give a listen.
 
As far as the allophon=
es project being underwhelming, my opinion is just the opposite.
I have got=
ten very clear concise answers to direct questions and have had my name men=
tioned
numerous times. Cut the speed to 87% and uncheck x cross, you don't =
need it.
only cue should be checked.
 
When you do a session do not try to =
listen to all the sounds at the same time
Relax and try to let your ear pic=
k out just the relevant stuff, that's in real time.
 
When you are going ov=
er the recording keep only the words that are clear and apparent
and clip o=
ut the other random junk like the, err eeh aah eer sounds.
 
You will find =
that in the seconds preceding a question, once the crap is peeled away the =
answer or statement is there.
Plus Ron, you have had no signal where you ar=
e since you started and have never had a chance to let your ear and brain b=
ecome
a custom to listening to this type of communication. Give it some tim=
e, work with it and most of all, approach it
with a positive attitude and a=
 relaxed frame of mind. I'm sure that soon the communication will start to =
come stronger and
make more sense.
 
Bruce
Bruce Halliday 


To: EVP-ITC@ya=
hoogroups.comFrom: ronriko@...: Thu, 3 Apr 2008 13:24:41 -0700Sub=
ject: Re: [EVP-ITC] EVP Maker (allaphone file) Method Test




To Bruce, St=
efan and others using EVPM. 
I have posted a file of my test with EVPM alla=
phones under ronriko files.  I forward this for two reasons:  the first as =
a request from Bruce to determine recurring words and second because I want=
ed to have experienced ears hear my recording for comments.   Regarding the=
 test, this is just 30 secs or so of a 7 minute recording.  Recorded at 90%=
 using EVPmaker with xcross.  I was able to hear "art and arthor" a number =
of times within the 7 minutes.  This is after requesting no names be spoken=
.  
 
Regarding my experiences with evpmaker and the allaphone file sent by=
 Stefan, I must say my results have been underwhelming.  I hear nothing but=
 evp gibberish.  I ask that anyone with an ear for this to give a listen an=
d tell me if you hear anything intelligent.  I am in a terrible radio zone =
here in Mexico so I have high hopes on EVP maker and the file Stefan provid=
ed.  Also excited about the fact that so many others are getting excellent =
communications.  Thank you to anyone who takes the time to listen to and co=
nfirm my recordings.  I am beginning to feel like I am being blocked out li=
ke William had thought.  Maybe I am in a true dead zone, no pun intended, o=
r "they" don't want me in the loop for some reason.  Ron L
 bhali333 <paran=
ormalinvestigating@...> wrote: 


To all that are experimenting wit=
h the EVPM allaphone file method.I have done a few sessions with this metho=
d as I know a few other researchers have.There have been a couple of resear=
chers that have done sessions and gotten very similar responses such as the=
 name "Arthur" and responses pertaining to "Air" also "I am here" or "here"=
.I have also gotten direct and intelligible answers to questions immediatel=
y following the question, and messages that could never be construed as ran=
dom.The test that I propose and the answer I seek is, The words that keep c=
oming up to almost all researchers experimenting with this method IE the wo=
rds I mentioned above.I would like to find out whether these certain words =
are simply by products of everyone using the same file and come up as a res=
ult of the file playing in evpm, or are they true entity communication.The =
only questionable content are these few words not all the methods communica=
tion. In my opinion the majority of the communication from this method is g=
enuine.The method has produced communication including my name to me as wel=
l as other researchers that have gotten my name, and some of the statements=
 and responses show signs of a sense of humor that would surely be absent i=
n random word grouping.Who ever is involved with experimentation of this me=
thod, will you please on your next session ask that if there is a spirit na=
med Arthur for him not to mention his name or the list of words that I have=
 posted. I suggest that this request be made verbally before the session as=
 well as after.And in the most polite manner. They seem to respond better t=
o formality.please dedicate one session no shorter than 2 minutes to this e=
xperiment and post your results.Your cooperation appreciated.Bruce


You ro=
ck. That's why Blockbuster's offering you one month of Blockbuster Total Ac=
cess, No Cost.
